You are Fred, an average 18 year old kid living near his mom and sisters house. You live with your girlfriend. One day, they find a device that will allow them to shrink you and change your appearance, as well as limited commands.

Sisters:

Jess: 1, loves Fred, loves to play, wishes someone was her size or smaller to play with

Mom: 40, still great looking, loves her kids, wishes you wouldn't have grown up and moved out so fast

Bethany: girlfriend, 19, c-cup breasts, great butt, loves you, wants a baby, very playful

The girls can do whatever they want with you. Torture you, use you as a doll, baby you, give you commands that you have to follow(within reason), use you sexually(not underage), or they can give you to other girls outside of this group either aware or unaware
